Usage: apic {{props:set}} OPTIONS NAME=VALUE ...

  Set or update one or more service properties

  Options
    -r, --{{remote}}                     use the remote app target (defaults to local)
    -S, --{{sevice}} SERVICE_NAME        service name
    -o, --{{organization}} ORGANIZATION  provider organization
    -s, --{{server}} SERVER              server endpoint host

  Set a property of the LoopBack application service
  {{$ apic props:set prop1=value1}}
  [{{climbon}}] prop1: value1

  Set a couple of properties of the LoopBack application service
  {{$ apic props:set prop1=value1 prop2=value2 prop3=value3}}
  [{{climbon}}] prop1: value1
  [{{climbon}}] prop2: value2
  [{{climbon}}] prop3: value3

  Set a property of the LoopBack application service explicitly
  {{$ apic props:set --service climbon prop1=value1}}
  {{prop1: value1}}

  Set a property of the {{Micro Gateway}} service
  {{$ apic props:set --service climbon-gw prop1=value1}}
  {{prop1: value1}}

  Set the properties of the remote application
  {{$ apic props:set --remote --service climbon --organization climbon --server mgmnthost.com prop1=value1 prop2=value2}}
  {{prop1: value1}}
  {{prop2: value2}}
